channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Blog
item.description: 一些技巧 字典 dict_test = [] items = {'a':'1','b':'2','c':'3'} for item in items: data = { 'x':items['a'], 'y':items['b'], 'z':items['c'] } dict_test.append(data) for i in dict_test: res = '{x},{y},{z}'.format(**i) print(res) 结果 1,2,3 1,2,3 1,2,3 a = [1,2,3,4,5] b = dict((c*2,c) for c in a) 结果： {2: 1, 4: 2, 6: 3, 8: 4, 10: 5} glob t1 = glob.glob(‘a*.jpg’) 并发 concurrent from concurrent import futures def fun(x): import time return time.ctime(),x def fun1(m,n): with futures.
